data.title: Pay Taxes
data.meta_description: For an overview of the Refundable State Income Tax Credit, please see: Refundable Income Tax Credits  For more detailed information, please see the state’s website:  2023 Income Tax Rate Cut …
data.text:
For an overview of the Refundable State Income Tax Credit, please see: Refundable Income Tax Credits

For more detailed information, please see the state’s website: 2023 Income Tax Rate Cut and Property Tax Rebate (wv.gov)

Pay or view your personal and/or real estate taxes online.

PLEASE NOTE:

Tax tickets that are paid online will show paid immediately. You may print a receipt by reentering the Pay Taxes portal and providing the email address and account number that was used when making payment.

Only tickets that were paid online are available to print via the website. All other receipt requests should be directed to our office by calling 304-357-0210.

The fee charged by our payment processor varies depending on payment type. The fees are as follows:

Credit cards: 2.4% of total taxes paid with a minimum of $2

Electronic checks: free

For information about Refundable State Income Tax Credit, please see: Refundable Income Tax Credits

Please see the state’s website for more information: 2023 Income Tax Rate Cut and Property Tax Rebate (wv.gov)
